reviewText: Poor story and worse acting.  Do not recommend.

Yup, this is an older X rated movie that was cut back to a hard-R rated movie.  For the ladies, they did happen to leave a bit of male c*& in one scene.  At any rate, consider this a soft-core film, the ladies are attractive and the director does dare to make sex part of the story.  Olinka fans will get an eye full.  Even with the hard-core scenes stripped out it is better than most of the stuff that passes for porn these days.

This is a very disappointment movie for the film producers cut out all the real sex for back when they were first released, they were porn films.  As consenting adults, we should be able to get what we purchased including the sex, and if we don't wish to see it, we can always fast forward or not purchase the movie, but let us make that decision instead of you who rip paying customers off!!!!!!  My money should be refunded!!  Customers, beware for it's old film makers trying to get more money and giving less product.  They spice the cover to make you purchase but it is deceiving!!!!  Buyer be ware!!!!
